title: Is it against the rules to change some of the other options in the config file?
body:
I remember reading up about how some players in 2011 were changing their settings so they could have higher fps such as grass sway and particle optimization in their config files, and I didn't want to get banned in case these were unallowed.

So are changing settings like those unallowed? It shouldn't be an "unfair advantage" since it limits gameplay, and is availible to everyone.

replies.body: We don't support modifications, and doing it is at your own risk.  If something were to go wrong or corrupt, we wouldn't be able to support you.  On the other hand I'm not familiar with the FPS fix you're referring to, but we have resources to help.  I suggest using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for a list of steps to help get this fixed up.  I hope that helps!
